title: Georgia Firm Recalls Mechanically Separated Chicken Product That May Contain Plastic
summary: WASHINGTON, June 19, 2013 Tip Top Poultry, Inc., a Rockmart, Ga., establishment is recalling approximately 18,000 pounds of mechanically separated chicken product that may contain pieces of plastic, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service announced today. The following product is subject...
